SEARCH

Class User

java.lang.Object
User
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserExt
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Scientist, SpaceAgencyRep
public abstract class User extends Object implements UserExt
Abstract base class representing a generic user in the space object tracking system.

This class defines shared fields and functionality for all user roles, including Scientist, Administrator, and Space Agency Representative.

Each subclass must implement the displayMenu() method to define role-specific actions.
